description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Wings With Chilli, Chive And Lime Butter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken wings,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chicken Wings With Chilli, Chive And Lime Butter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 long red chillies, deseeded, finely chopped
2 large lime, 1 rind finely grated and juiced, 1 cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Combine soy, sugar, honey and tomato sauce in a bowl. Place chicken wings in a large snaplock bag. Add marinade, seal bag and shake to coat chicken. Marinate in refrigerator for at least 2 hours or preferably overnight.

Combine butter, chilli, lime rind, lime juice and chives in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Spoon mixture onto a sheet of baking paper and form into a 10cm log. Roll up, firmly twisting the paper ends to secure. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until firm.

Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Remove wings from marinade and place on prepared tray. Bake, basting every 15 minutes, for 45 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Top with slices of chilli, chive and lime butter. Serve with lime wedges.
